name: WizWiz Elevator Munch
description:
You're Rowdy and you work on a tower close by. There your job is to feed the elevator piranhas what they ask for (Check the in-game dream bubble). Beware of enemies that may pop up, you don't wanna lose your job! To survive, defeat enemies and feed the piranhas with the food that they drop. You can shoot sparkles with the ❎ button, but this one also shoots whatever food you're carrying. Not only does this mean that you have to be careful with what and where you shoot, but you can also shoot useless food to enemies to cleanup the screen!

 

☕ Coffee Bat - Code, Graphics and sound 🐰 Dualsh0x - Sprites and artwork 🖥️ Sinclair - Help with music
